block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Ian McEwan (above), the author of ''On Chesil Beach''; Amanda Hesser on cookbooks; Steven Heller on graphic design books; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
Links: Reviews of the books chosen in the writers' survey.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''After Dark,'' by Haruki Murakami; ''The Ministry of Special Cases,'' by Nathan Englander; and other books.
Books Update E-Mail: Receive a selective overview of new book reviews and features every Sunday.
